rule_text: Q:  When an ability other than 'Production' allows you to produce one or more units, do you have to pay for the units produced?    A:  Yes, a unit that is produced must always be paid for.      Q:  When producing a unit with an ability other than 'Production,' does the price reduction from the 'Sarween Tools' technology apply?    A:  No, 'Sarween Tools' is only used with the 'Production' ability.
